CustomField.description: The name of the profile that your community users should be created with. (Example: Customer Community User, Customer Community Login User, or some custom profile you've cloned/created)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name of the profile that your community users should be created with. (Example: Customer Community User, Customer Community Login User, or some custom profile you've cloned/created)
CustomField.label: Contact Profile Name
